about_the_game:
The year is 2058. In a dystopic future where the USA leads as the de facto only world power, play as Liv: An agent of the S.I.N (Supernatural Investigations Network). You will be sent to an oil station in the middle of the Pacific, stuck in 1982. Your mission? Discover what’s causing problems in the system so the station can continue working without being noticed. But this place is full of secrets and Liv is just a cog in the machine.

Explore a petrol station (Complex B13B) full of secrets and mysteries. The environment and the people who live in it will react to your actions and the events happening at the station. Rooms, lights, dialogues, and so much more will change... with time.  Explore and test the possibilities of the time loop while making your way to uncover the truth.

Meet Frank, Alice, Needle, Kira, and The Archivist. Learn their stories, secrets, and motivations. Everyone has a key role in Complex B13B and yours will be to find it. With a sprawling dialogue system that’ll let you confront them as you please. Good cop or bad cop? And more important. What would you do when you discover their stories?

The T.M.R (Time Manipulation Recorder) is the main tool of Myrmica. With it, you can investigate and manipulate the characters and the world around you. Thanks to the T.M.R, you can create your own solutions and situations, use their routines to your advantage, and explore the way to solve the mysteries the station holds.

This game is a university project by students at U-tad. The masters involved are design, art, programming, modeling, concept, animation, rigging, and production from U-tad and the master's degree in musical creation and production from Loyola University.

short_description: Myrmica is an investigation and puzzle adventure viewed from an isometric perspective. Explore a petrol station while chased by a time anomaly. Manipulate the routines of 5 unique characters to achieve your goal, create your situations trapped in a time loop, and uncover the truth of Complex B13B
